entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Manicouagan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:15 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -34.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lac Manouane East 07:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -34.1°C
Humidity: 68 %
Dewpoint: -38.0°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 23.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then clearing. Local blowing snow this morning. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 near noon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 53 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
